char_info.desc: The Phantoms Who Leap Through Time

a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: Who the heck is this girl, and why is she here in the first place?

a1.speaker: Kagami:
a1.dialogue: From the look of it, it seems you are in the mood for a raid.

a2.speaker: Kagami:
a2.dialogue: Now, join me on this sacking of that mysterious concert.

a3.speaker: Kagami:
a3.dialogue: Once we are done, we can share the loot from raiding if there are any.

a4.speaker: Yumi:
a4.dialogue: Sister! I was hurt by some knives, and apparently, that maid over there threw them at me!

a5.speaker: Sakuya:
a5.dialogue: Oh ho, so now both of you are trying to approach me.

a6.speaker: Sakuya:
a6.dialogue: Instead of insisting I join a raid on that concert, now you are going to retaliate at me?

a7.speaker: Kagami:
a7.dialogue: It is said that you will reap what you see. You can choose between two only:

a8.speaker: Kagami:
a8.dialogue: Either get out or proceed to head into the concert to do the raiding for me.

a9.speaker: Yumi:
a9.dialogue: Plot twist: Both choices mean that you will be the one who bites the dust for hurting me!

a10.speaker: Sakuya:
a10.dialogue: I don't know what the heck is going on with you, so I have no choice but to face its 'mastermind'. It's my job.

a11.speaker: Kagami:
a11.dialogue: So, you have chosen death. Any last words you want to say here? Feel free!

a12.speaker: Yumi:
a12.dialogue: That's too lenient! This person should deserve to die without them disseminating their last ill will to the world!
